Package controllers

Class AppointmentScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.MyController
      • controllers.AppointmentScreenController
  • public class AppointmentScreenController
extends MyController
    Holds the functions for operating the Appointment Screen.

      • backButtonListener

        public void backButtonListener()
        Called when the Back button is pressed. Redirects the user to the Home Screen.

      • addButtonListener

        public void addButtonListener()
        Called when the Add button is pressed. Redirects the user to the Appointment Form.

      • modifyButtonListener

        public void modifyButtonListener()
        Called when the Modify button is pressed. Redirects the user to the Appointment Form.

      • deleteButtonListener

        public void deleteButtonListener()
        Called when the Delete button is pressed. If an Appointment is selected, then a dialogue box appears.

      • allRadioButtonListener

        public void allRadioButtonListener()
        Called when the All radio button is pressed.

        Called when the user pressed the "<" button to scroll to the last time period.

      • nextPeriodButtonListener

        public void nextPeriodButtonListener()
        Called when the user presses the ">" button to scroll to the next time period.
